exclusion.criterion: Documented Liver disease, biliary disease (congenital or acquired), hemolytic diseases and history of alcoholism
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cases revealed other pathology than appendicitis by CT and laparoscopy
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

notes: 17-year-old boy complaining of severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen that started four days ago. He was febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation.
